item.title: ~~how to make a 614 webclient~~noob friendly
item.dc:creator: @ladesman ladesman
item.description:
@ladesman wrote:

i got the link that u posted for someone else on a diffrent forum so i got all the stuff but what i need now is that when ever i load ur webclient.jar it loads but dsnt let me log in. but then when i make my own webclient.jar so that it connects to my ip it says this

load: class launch.class not found.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: launch.class
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass0(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.io.FileNotFoundException: C:\xampp\htdocs\launch\class.class (The system cannot find the path specified)
at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source)
at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.connect(Unknown Source)
at sun.net.www.protocol.file.FileURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source)
at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
… 9 more
Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: launch.class

so please help me i will pay if i have to message me on msn or reply on here please!

Read full topic

item.title: ~~how to make a 614 webclient~~noob friendly
item.dc:creator: @_Kate1 ,Kate
item.description:
@_Kate1 wrote:

I know understand this, although It had taken me a while to understand your wording - It seemed as If various parts were all over the thread, making me thing I must create 2 jar files, and sign both - when I really only had to jar my class files, and sign it. Then move it to HTDocs in Xampp, and create a new HTML file with the code snippet for the client page!

But I will rewrite this tutorial - including on making sure that the webclient connects to the server, and actually loads up with port 80- thank you for this tutorial!

Read full topic
